content: --अर्थ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} self-interested. {2} having its own or true meaning. {3} having one's own object or aim. {4} pleonastic. (--र्थः {1} one's own interest, self-interest; सर्वः स्वार्थं समीहते <ls>Śi. 2. 65</ls>; स्वार्थात्सतां गुरुतरा प्रणयिक्रियैव <ls>V. 4. 15.</ls> {2} own or inherent meaning; स्वार्थे णिच्, स्वार्थे कप्रत्ययः &c.; <ls>Bv. 1. 79</ls> (where both senses are intended).
